channel.title: Rune c'bow...?
channel.description:
ok everythings added, almost everything is perfect lol
how i make it randomly hit higher?
maybe like
normal hit + random 0-50
like if u hit a 13 then if the random higher hit kicks in, makes it hit 63 as max
any help 2 make a random higher hit?
i saw a tut a long time whe ni ddn't care but now i kinda need it lol, ALL HELP ACCEPTING (rep++ hint hint)
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 24, 2008, 06:18:22 pm[/size][hr]anyone.....????
